text: Naomi Watts and Liam Neeson are NOT Dating!! Truth to the False article. The recent news of Naomi Watts and Liam Neeson has been gaining the attention when National Enquirer stated the wrong heading of the two celebrities dating. It was later found out that Naomi and Liam were not dating despite the news on the tabloid. The truth of the news After the news was posted, GossipCop debunks the claim by saying – We ’ re told it ’ s “ not true. ” When there is a false rumor there is Gossip cop to correct the false story.
